items.sentence: Who\'ll stay with your children while you\'re out working?
Have you told everyone when and where the meeting will be?
I could tell you things about Tom that would surprise you.
Tom told Mary that she could do whatever she wanted to do.
What do you spend most of your time on the computer doing?
I saw Mary sitting in front of a mirror brushing her hair.
Tom doesn\'t seem to understand what he\'s supposed to do.
Tom doesn\'t have to tell me anything he doesn\'t want to.
You shouldn\'t respect someone just because they\'re rich.
Tom asked Mary to teach him some useful phrases in French.
